## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contribution guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My entry follows the format: `[Name](link) - Description.`
- [ ] The description is concise (one sentence), starts with a capital letter, and ends with a period
- [ ] I have added the entry in alphabetical order within its category
- [ ] I have verified the link works and points to the official source
- [ ] The tool/resource is actively maintained
- [ ] I have checked for duplicate entries
- [ ] I have spell-checked my addition
